title: Art in the Park
description: A beloved one-day outdoor art fair in Salcedo Park featuring 60+ galleries, student groups, and collectives. Visitors enjoy affordable contemporary art, live music, and food stalls under the trees.

title: Ayala Museum
description: Makati’s premier museum showcasing Philippine art, history, and culture. Highlights include the Diorama Experience, pre-colonial gold artifacts, Southeast Asian ceramics, and rotating contemporary exhibits.

title: Ayala Triangle Gardens
description: An urban oasis in Makati’s business district with shaded walkways, landscaped lawns, and seasonal light displays. Perfect for lunch breaks, evening strolls, or quiet reading under trees.

title: Dream Lab
description: An immersive 4,000m² simulation playground in Circuit Makati with 20+ interactive zones. Kids and families role-play entrepreneurs, create installations, and explore imaginative worlds.

title: Glorietta
description: A landmark shopping hub in the Ayala Center with retail shops, dining, cinemas, and events. Connected to surrounding malls and gardens, it’s a go-to for shopping and entertainment.

title: Greenbelt Mall
description: An upscale lifestyle mall blending luxury shopping, fine dining, and open garden courtyards. Known for international brands, cultural events, and relaxing garden paths.

title: Guadalupe Ruins
description: Remnants of a 17th-century stone church, offering a tranquil heritage site amid modern Makati. Its weathered walls and arches are perfect for history lovers and photographers.

title: Legazpi Active Park
description: A 0.75-hectare park in Legazpi Village with jogging paths, playground, and open lawns. It also hosts the popular Legazpi Sunday Market, a hub for foodies and local artisans.

title: Washington SyCip Park
description: A serene green space named after banker Washington SyCip, featuring a koi pond, gazebos, and sculptures by Impy Pilapil. Ideal for quiet breaks, reading, or casual strolls.

title: Salcedo Weekend Market
description: A bustling Saturday morning market in Salcedo Village. Find fresh produce, gourmet food, crafts, plants, and local delicacies in a lively open-air setting.

title: Poblacion Linear Park
description: A riverside park along the Pasig River in historic Poblacion, linking heritage sites and Rockwell. Enjoy shaded benches, walking paths, and scenic views.

title: De La Rosa Elevated Walkway
description: A 1.1 km network of pedestrian walkways above Makati’s busy streets. Connecting malls, offices, and hospitals, it makes urban walking safe and convenient.

title: Yuchengco Museum
description: An art and design museum in Makati hosting contemporary exhibits, cultural showcases, and heritage displays. A complement to the Ayala Museum’s collections.

title: Salcedo Nights Live
description: An evening concert series in Salcedo Park featuring orchestras, choirs, and classical performances under the stars. A cultural highlight for locals and visitors alike.
